items.title: Certificate in MYOB AccountRight Premier Course
items.headline: Discover how you can gain great accounting knowledge and become a confident MYOB user in just 4 weeks!
objectives_summary: Certificate in MYOB AccounRight Premier Course is consist of four different MYOB and Accounting courses and it is designed to teach you step by step how to process huge accounting transactions in the real business setting using MYOB AccounRight Premier. The course walks you through to the entire accounting and MYOB processes and you learn MYOB AccountRight Premier from scratch.  From the very beginning, every click you make in MYOB you have a brief and clear explanation in plain english as well as an interactive corresponding screenshot with the answer for you to check before you move on to the next section.  Since you have answer for every exercise and working with real and related business transactions, you are always sure that you are learning correctly and understand how both accounting and MYOB processes work.  The course comes with the MYOB step by step hours of high quality video lectures covering MYOB functions in great details with answer for every sections and exercises.  Don't take my words for it, see the actual testimonials from my business clients and individual learners who have taken this course by watching the testimonial video below.  For full course topics and contents, refer to the course outline.  Enrol now to achieve your certificate in MYOB AccountRight Premier 2016

items.title: Certified Management Accountant's 2021 Exam #1 Prep.
items.headline: Be A CMA by the end of 2021. Know how to pass Exam #1. Course material is compliant with  IMA's 2020 Learning outcomes.
objectives_summary: Understand which learning objectives will be tested by the IMA on Part 1 exam for the Certified Management Accounting designation. There are helpful hints as to what will be on exam and many practice questions in areas that the IMA will test.
Be able to anticipate what will be on a CMA exam by knowing what accounting concepts are always tested and be able to score a passing mark.
